review.reviewBody: It was very tasty,  but the potion are very small. you should never feel hungry after eating a pasta meal
Preferred garlic yammies, got regular, chicken burger bun was soaked in oil, burger was completely flavourless, donuts were stale and hard. Honestly meal was horrible. Inedible
Chicken burger was greasy, and oddly completely favor less, yam frie order was incorrect, donuts were hard, and not fresh most likely leftovers that were refried. Very, very disappointing.
burger was lovely. wouldn't order the Brussel sprouts again. were very bitter n covered in lemon juice
Nashville hot chicken was pretty damn good
